info.name: Youtube Translucent Headline(Top bar)
info.description:
This stylesheet is enlarge showing area of Yotube video for 4K display users
If need search box move to top center your cursor for appear that hidden
info.additionalInfo:
10/18/2024 - Prevented top bar visibility changes
02/08/2023 - Updated for Youtube site top bar structure changes(fixed for top bar is not be applied translucent)
12/25/2022 - Prevent hiding search input area when has focused
12/21/2022 - Applied ux-safe for under 4k windowd case
